column4: Is there a way to change the Gnome menu top-level menus? Such as adding more than 3(Apps,Places,System)? I know it can be done by editing the menu list files, but I was hoping for something a little less time consuming.
doesn't alacarte let you do that?
I was hoping so, but alacarte just lets you edit whats inside the 3 top-level menus. You can't add or remove any.
and we will all love you for it
